apcsa.franklin.inheritance.geo

Class Ellipse

  • java.lang.Object
    • apcsa.franklin.inheritance.geo.Ellipse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Shape2D
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle

    public class Ellipse
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape2D
    This class represents an Ellipse which has a center, width and height. Implements: Shape2D Subclasses: Circle

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ellipse

        public Ellipse(Point center,
               double dx,
               double dy)
        Constructor for an Ellipse at a given center with a certain width and height.
        Parameters:
        center - the center of the ellipse.
        dx - half the width.
        dy - half the height.
